item.description:
Hello everyone,

At long last: I've scheduled another meeting in the same room as before at Maine College of Art and hope to see you there.

Erik has generously offered to share a short presentation on applying animations to text and everyone else is invited to propose something long or short beforehand or, if need be: while we're meeting.

I've a few things about video I could share and invite you to add to... and I look forward to seeing whatever else is brought to the table, including you.

I welcome your thoughts, either posted to this forum, sent to the group email, or privately to me at brianureeves@gmail.com

Thanks for considering coming,
Brian
item.how_to_find_us: Sign in at front desk, up to 2nd floor & back to room 207 on right side of hall.
item.name: iPhone developers meetup #4
